page.title: 19BWRLWM BRO
page.content: BWRLWM BRO __________ Every year we have an event called BWRLWM BRO.It is similar to the t.v programme "IT'S A KNOCKOUT" where all the surrounding villages select a team to compete against each other.The competitions include pillow fighting,tug-of-war(men and women) BMX bike racing,a water marathon and obstacle races.There are categories for all age groups.The winning village receives a shield,which it keeps for one year and Â£50 to spend on the community.All the events are aimed to give every age group a chance.The favourite event is the "CELTIC WRESTLING"which is performed within a circle of sawdust.The first to gain two falls wins the contest.
